original_text: But some men did want us to obey all the Jewish rules. Those men came secretly among our group. They said that they were believers, but they were not really true believers. They wanted to see how we lived as believers. They wanted to know how Christ Jesus has made us free from the Jewish rules. They wanted to make us slaves to those rules.
korean_text: 이는 가만히 들어온 거짓 형제들 때문이라 그들이 가만히 들어온 것은 그리스도 예수 안에서 우리가 가진 자유를 엿보고 우리를 종으로 삼고자 함이로되

sentences.original_text: But some men did want us to obey all the Jewish rules.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람들은 우리가 모든 유대 율법을 지키기를 원했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Those men came secretly among our group.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 비밀리에 우리 그룹에 들어왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They said that they were believers,
but they were not really true believers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 실제로는 진실한 믿는 사람들이 아니었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted to see how we lived as believers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 믿는 사람으로서 우리가 어떻게 사는지 보고 싶어했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted to know how Christ Jesus has made us free
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그리스도 예수께서 우리를 어떻게 자유롭게 하셨는지 알고 싶어했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted to make us slaves to those rules.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 우리를 그 율법의 종이 되게 하려고 했습니다.
